solution_code: public class Solution {--newline--    public int minMoves(int[] nums) {--newline--        if (nums.length == 0) return 0;--newline--        int min = nums[0];--newline--        for (int n : nums) min = Math.min(min, n);--newline--        int res = 0;--newline--        for (int n : nums) res += n - min;--newline--        return res;--newline--    }--newline--}--newline--
